title: DataDeIdentificationAndAnonymization
description: An object that represents a data de-identification and anonymization request

request.description: This is the request to be performed to anonymize or de-identify the data

data.description: Data object to anonymize or de-identify

dataId.description: The unique identification of the data on the system

action.description: The action to be performed on the data item - either anonymization or de-identification

deIdCriteria.description: De-identification criteria to apply to this data item

anonymCriteria.description: Anonymization criteria to apply to this data item

resultCode.description: Some internal code that represents the result of the request

resultMessage.description: The message resulting from the request

dataId.description: The unique identification of the data anonymized of de-identified
